The overall aim of our 2020 targets is to protect the environment, improve efficiency, and increase stakeholder 
value. Our targets are designed to track our progress through deliberate efforts—without influence from growth  
or contraction in our business. We created a portfolio of projects and initiatives that we specifically execute to bring results in our target areas. We track the performance of these projects and initiatives against a 2012 baseline, counting results of projects and initiatives confirmed through a formal measurement process.
